#summary Create or update grid service information about a scene.
#labels Protocol-Grid

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||AddScene||String||Yes||
||`SceneID`||UUID of the scene to add or update||UUID||Yes||
||`Enabled`||True if this scene is online and can accept service communication||Boolean||Yes||
||`Name`||Scene name||String||Optional^1^||
||`MinPosition`||Bottom southwest corner of the scene's bounding box||Vector3d||Optional^1^||
||`MaxPosition`||Top northeast corner of the scene's bounding box||Vector3d||Optional^1^||
||`Address`||URL that is used for service communication with the scene||Uri||Optional^1^||
||`ExtraData`||Free form JSON data associated with this scene||JSON||Optional||

  * ^1^These parameters are required if Enabled is True

{{{
RequestMethod=AddScene
&SceneID=65d9cd99-8552-44a3-8f3f-73ac76121144
&Enabled=1
&Name=Test+Scene
&MinPosition=%3C128%2C+128%2C+25%3E
&MaxPosition=%3C512%2C+512%2C+50%3E
&Address=http://simulator.example.com:12035/scenes/Test%20Scene
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if the scene was successfully added or updated, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"Bounding box collides with existing scene"
}
}}}
